name: Arena Mania: Magic Heroes CCG
description:
Arena Mania is a game that combines idle gameplay and strategic combat elements. You will find themselves in a fantasy land where gods from both the East and West are in constant conflict, and foreign invaders pose a constant threat to the land's safety. You can fight with your companion, each companion has a unique combat power, and they will assist you in battle. You need to adjust their lineup in real-time, unleash their strongest combat power, and defeat opponents to fight for the honor of protecting the land. In Arena Mania, you are the one who quells disputes, redeems the world, and defeats opponents in one fell swoop!

Game Features:
------A fantastic land awaits your salvation!------
The game is set in a fantasy land where gods from both the East and West are in constant conflict, and foreign invaders pose a constant threat to the land's safety! As a brave young hero, you need to use strategy to complete battles and fight with companions of different attributes to move forward together!

------Idle gameplay,lets you play anytime!-----
You can choose to let the game automatically fight, without manual operation, and play anytime, anywhere! You can also automatically gain resources while offline! Free your hands now!

-----Various heroes help you move forward!-----
You can summon various heroes in the game and move forward with them. Each companion has different combat power and attributes, and they will assist you in battle! Different combinations of heroes trigger different enhancement effects, creating more varied combat styles, making your adventure in the divine world more exciting!

------Adjust your strategy to win every battle!-----
When facing different bosses, you need to adjust the positions of their companions to maximize their combat power. The layout of the lineup affects the outcome of the battle! Rich freedom of combination, and various strategies can help you turn defeat into victory!
